long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your learning experience with the Juno Journey LXP Extension, designed to seamlessly integrate with major online learning content providers. This powerful tool offers personalized recommendations and streamlined processes to maximize your professional development journey.

Key Features:

Content Recognition and Indication:

Instantly recognizes when you're on a supported content provider's page, whether a course, a book, an event or any other type of learning content. An indication will show up on the extension icon.


Easy Request Submission:

With just a click, auto-populate details such as title, provider, and price from the content page you're viewing.
Effortlessly submit a request for content directly from the extension, simplifying the approval process within your company.


Personalized Recommendations:

Receive AI-generated insights on why a content item is relevant to you, taking into account your job title, skill set, and learning objectives.
Tailored advice helps you make informed decisions on which content to consume  for your professional development.


Budget Management:

Select which credit line to use for course purchases, as defined by your company admin.
